overview.en: Aavegotchi (GHST) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Aavegotchi has a current supply of 48,842,219.24933171 with 45,282,255.74914421 in circulation. The last known price of Aavegotchi is 1.38007942 USD and is down -2.58 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 20 active market(s) with $29,933,352.84 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://aavegotchi.com/.
